Narrator: rick only speaks in machine code but homer can translate it
Narrator: Prompt By: Quinnobi 42
Rick: 01010100 01101000 01100001 01110100 00100111 01110011 00100000 01110011 01101111 01101101 01100101 00100000 01100011 01110010 01100001 01110000 00101100 00100000 01001101 01101111 01110010 01110100 01111001 00101110
[Morty walks to Rick]
Morty: Uh, Rick, I can't understand you. You're talking in machine code. 
Rick: 01010111 01100101 00100000 01101110 01100101 01100101 01100100 00100000 01110100 01101111 00100000 01100111 01101111 00100000 01110100 01101111 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01010011 01101001 01101101 01110000 01110011 01101111 01101110 01110011 00101110
[Morty walks to Center Stage]
Morty: The Simpsons? Why the frick do we need to go there, Rick? 
Rick: 01010011 01101111 00100000 01001000 01101111 01101101 01100101 01110010 00100000 01100011 01100001 01101110 00100000 01110100 01110010 01100001 01101110 01110011 01101100 01100001 01110100 01100101 00100000 01101101 01111001 00100000 01101101 01100001 01100011 01101000 01101001 01101110 01100101 00100000 01100011 01101111 01100100 01100101 00101110 
[Rick and Morty enter the portal to SimpsonsHouse]
Homer: Hey, Rick and Morty. What brings you here?
Morty: Rick's talking in machine code, Homer. Can you translate?
Homer: Sure, let me give it a shot. 
Rick: 01010100 01101000 01100001 01101110 01101011 01110011 00101100 00100000 01001000 01101111 01101101 01100101 01110010 00101110
Homer: He said, "Thanks, Homer."
Morty: Uh, thanks, Homer. Can you translate what he said earlier?
Rick: 01010011 01101111 00100000 01001000 01101111 01101101 01100101 01110010 00100000 01100011 01100001 01101110 00100000 01110100 01110010 01100001 01101110 01110011 01101100 01100001 01110100 01100101 00100000 01101101 01111001 00100000 01101101 01100001 01100011 01101000 01101001 01101110 01100101 00100000 01100011 01101111 01100100 01100101 00101110
Homer: He said, "So Homer can translate my machine code."
Morty: Oh, so that's why we're here. Can you ask him how to fix this, Homer?
Rick: 01010111 01100101 00100000 01101110 01100101 01100101 01100100 00100000 01110100 01101111 00100000 01100111 01101111 00100000 01100010 01100001 01100011 01101011 00100000 01110100 01101111 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01100111 01100001 01110010 01100001 01100111 01100101 00101110
Homer: He said, "We need to go back to the garage."
Morty: Alright, let's go back then. Shoot, this is confusing.
[Rick and Morty enter the portal to the Garage]
Morty: Thanks for your help, Homer.
